data.eml:eml: Half-jumping plant lice - a taxonomic revision of the distinctive psyllid genus Togepsylla Kuwayama with a reassessment of morphology (Hemiptera, Psylloidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Luo, Xinyu, Cai, Wanzhi, Qiao, Gexia (2017): Half-jumping plant lice - a taxonomic revision of the distinctive psyllid genus Togepsylla Kuwayama with a reassessment of morphology (Hemiptera, Psylloidea). ZooKeys 716: 63-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.716.13916, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.716.13916
